      • addUser

        boolean addUser(String userName,
              String password,
              String salt,
              String role)
        Adds a new user to the realm.
        Parameters:
        userName -
        password - hashed password base64 encoded
        salt - base64 encoded random salt
        role - user role
        Returns:
        true if the user is added or false if the user already exists
